alert.note: Alert for Eastern Curry County and Josephine County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 3:49AM PST until March 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches. * WHERE...For the Winter Storm Warning, western and southern Josephine and eastern Curry counties and the Illinois Valley. This includes Selma, Cave Junction, and O`Brien. For the Winter Weather Advisory, this includes northeast Josephine and eastern Curry County, including Grants Pass, Wilderville, Murphy, and Sunny Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors. * A Winter Storm Warning means that severe winter weather is occurring and poses a threat to life and property. Take protective action now.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Curry County and Josephine County
